Title: Relates to the obligations of a physician upon the termination of a relationship with a patient
Summary: Relates to the obligations of a physician upon the termination of a relationship with a patient; requires the physician to provide thirty days notice to the patient, to continue to provide care and prescriptions to the patient, and to provide referrals and copies of patient records.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the obligations of a physician upon the termination of a relationship with a patient
